13 class ControllerAction {
14  private $controller;
15  private $action;
16  private $parameters;
17  private $dValues;
18  private $annots;
19  private static $excludeds = [ "__construct","isValid","initialize","finalize","onInvalidControl","loadView","forward","redirectToRoute","getView","message","loadDefaultView","getDefaultViewName","showSimpleMessage","showConfMessage" ];
20  public static $controllers = [ ];
21 
22  public function __construct($controller = "", $action = "", $parameters = [], $dValues = [], $annots = []) {
23  $this->controller = $controller;
24  $this->action = $action;
25  $this->parameters = $parameters;
26  $this->dValues = $dValues;
27  $this->annots = $annots;
28  }
29 
30  public static function initWithPath($url) {
31  $result = [ ];
32  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
33  $ns = $config ["mvcNS"] ["controllers"];
34  if ($ns !== "" && $ns !== null) {
35  $ns .= "\\";
36  }
37  if (! $url) {
38  $url = "_default";
39  }
40  if (UString::endswith ( $url, "/" ))
41  $url = \substr ( $url, 0, strlen ( $url ) - 1 );
42  $u = \explode ( "/", $url );
43  $u [0] = $ns . $u [0];
44  if (\class_exists ( $u [0] )) {
45  $controllerClass = $u [0];
46  if (\count ( $u ) < 2)
47  $u [] = "index";
48  if (\method_exists ( $controllerClass, $u [1] )) {
49  $method = new \ReflectionMethod ( $u [0], $u [1] );
50  $r = self::scanMethod ( $controllerClass, $method );
51  if (isset ( $r ))
52  $result [] = $r;
53  }
54  }
55  return $result;
56  }
57 
58  public static function init() {
59  $result = [ ];
60  $config = Startup::getConfig ();
61 
62  $files = CacheManager::getControllersFiles ( $config, true );
63  try {
64  $restCtrls = CacheManager::getRestCache ();
65  } catch ( \Exception $e ) {
66  $restCtrls = [ ];
67  }
68 
69  foreach ( $files as $file ) {
70  if (is_file ( $file )) {
71  $controllerClass = ClassUtils::getClassFullNameFromFile ( $file );
72  if (class_exists ( $controllerClass, true ) && isset ( $restCtrls [$controllerClass] ) === false) {
73  self::$controllers [] = $controllerClass;
74  $reflect = new \ReflectionClass ( $controllerClass );
75  if (! $reflect->isAbstract () && $reflect->isSubclassOf ( Controller::class ) && ! $reflect->isSubclassOf ( SeoController::class )) {
76  $methods = $reflect->getMethods ( \ReflectionMethod::IS_PUBLIC );
77  foreach ( $methods as $method ) {
78  $r = self::scanMethod ( $controllerClass, $method );
79  if (isset ( $r ))
80  $result [] = $r;
81  }
82  }
83  }
84  }
85  }
86  return $result;
87  }
88 
89  private static function scanMethod($controllerClass, \ReflectionMethod $method) {
90  $result = null;
91  if (\array_search ( $method->name, self::$excludeds ) === false && ! UString::startswith ( $method->name, "_" )) {
92  $annots = Router::getAnnotations ( $controllerClass, $method->name );
93  $parameters = $method->getParameters ();
94  $defaults = [ ];
95  foreach ( $parameters as $param ) {
96  if ($param->isOptional () && ! $param->isVariadic ()) {
97  $defaults [$param->name] = $param->getDefaultValue ();
98  }
99  }
100  $result = new ControllerAction ( $controllerClass, $method->name, $parameters, $defaults, $annots );
101  }
102  return $result;
103  }
104

106  return $this->controller;

150  public function getPath() {
151  $reflect = new \ReflectionClass ( $this->controller );
152  return $reflect->getShortName () . "/" . $this->action;
153  }
154 
155  public function getId() {
156  return $this->getPath ();
157  }
